summary: Complete overhaul of the Skyrim experience, amazing graphics with 60fps, numerous of gameplay tweaks, the perfect Skyrim Experience. Multilanguage!
descriptionHtml:
[img align=center]http://i1250.photobucket.com/albums/hh523/laxxino/Project%20ARISE/title2.jpg[/img]

[color=blue][size=12]Introduction[/size][/color]

[color=yellow]Total Skyrim Overhaul, not just a compilation of mod: starting from a complete retweaks of the shaders, the post processing, the color, the lightning, the weather and many many other tweaks,  your Skyrim graphic will get and extremely insane boost. The fun is that most of you will have all those wonders at 60fps.
Also solved the stuttering by putting the fpslimiter at 59. (this fix works for ati cards, 100% tested).
With the addition of numerous Skyrim addons, longly tested, u will also enhance your Skyrim gameplay thru a [/color][color=red][b]very balanced gameplay[/b][/color], [color=yellow]who will never get you bored (im personally at 200 hours played and still have a GREAT blast from it).[/color]

A.R.I.S.E. use an extremely tweaked and optimized ENBseries + FXAA post process injector, Script Dragon and SKSE.

[color=green]It\'s very late here while im uploading my mod, i will add a lot of contents tomorrow, to complete the gameplay overhaul, for now be happy with the graphic modification![/color]

[size=18]IF U LIKE THIS MOD, PLEASE ENDORSE ME![/size]


[color=blue][size=14]Installation[/size][/color]
Installation is extremely simple, just follow those simple steps.

1) Download and install the [color=yellow][b]FXAA post process injector[/b][/color], you can get it by clicking [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=131]here[/URL].
Download the version 1_3 Installer, install it and select the PRESET 1.
2) Download and install the [color=yellow][b]Skyrim Script Dragon[/b][/color]. You can download it by clicking [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8221]here[/URL]
3) Download and install the [color=yellow]SKSE[/color]. You can download it at [b][URL=http://skse.silverlock.org]here[/url][/b]
4) Download the [color=yellow][b]A.R.I.S.E main file[/b][/color], extract it in your Skyrim folder (the one who contains TESV.exe), usually is [b]\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim[/b], overwrite when asked.
5) Download and install those mods listed below, install them in this exact order and overwrite when asked.
6) Play Skyrim and drool at it!

[color=blue][size=12]List of mods[/size][/color]

1. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1329]Beauty faces for female[/URL]
2. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]XCE character enhancements[/URL]
3. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=607]Skyrim HD lite[/URL]
*****important: get the LITE version if u want to keep 60fps, u wont see the difference in visuals****
4. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=60]Enhanced blood textures[/URL]
5. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=85]Enhanced night Skyrim[/URL]
6. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2146]Serious HD retexture[/URL]
7. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=711]RWT realistic water textures[/URL]
8. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2674]Improved NPC clothing[/URL]
9. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2616]Sun and cloud textures[/URL]
10. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3147]Redefined Dungeons[/URL]
11. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2747]Dungeon Tweaks[/URL]
12. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=141]Skyrim total flora overhaul[/URL]
[tab]12.1 [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3385]Install Lush Trees Main Files[/URL]
[tab]12.2 [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3385]Install Lush Trees - vurt\'s compatibility patch[/URL]
13. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3288]Lush grass[/URL]
14. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6387]Skyrim performance plus[/URL] *dont upgrade the 3 files, just install them from scratch*
15.[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8403]Shadow striping fix[/URL]
16.[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2947]Deadly spells impacts[/URL]
17.[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621]Bellyaches animal texture pack[/URL]
18. [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7025]Nightingale retext[/URL]

[color=red]Do not use the Bethesda texture pack, they give u bigger FPS impact than the one i choose and they are way worse than A.R.I.S.E.\'s ones.[/color]


[size=18]IT\'S LATE I NEED TO SLEEP, I WILL UPLOAD THE GAMEPLAY PART TOMORROW, KEEP IN TOUCH![/size]
author: Enhok
